snippet.title: Not For Broadcast VR | Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
The award-winning news management and propaganda sim, Not For Broadcast, is launching on SteamVR and Meta Quest (2, Pro) on March 23rd, 2023!

Not For Broadcast VR takes the gameplay, story, and gripping dark comedy of the original award-winning FMV adventure and brings you closer to the news than ever before.

Edit the shots, censor the swears and hand-pick the headlines: now with your very own hands!

Wishlist on SteamVR:
https://tblink.co/NFB-VR

Join our community on Discord:
https://discord.gg/notforbroadcast
